import React, { useState } from "react"; import "bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css"; import "bootstrap/dist/js/bootstrap.bundle.min"; import "../styles/Header.css"; import "bootstrap-icons/font/bootstrap-icons.css"; import Body from "./Body"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import { Modal } from "react-bootstrap"; import Auth from "./Auth"; const Header = () => { const [showModal, setShowModal] = useState(false); const handleOpenModal = () => setShowModal(true); const handleCloseModal = () => setShowModal(false); return (
{/* ---Header--- */}

); }; export default Header;
